EmailTemplate.name: Event - Partner Day 2015.Email - Final Confirmation to Registrants - Partner Day
EmailTemplate.subject: Partner Day 2015 - See you soon in Vienna
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
Thank you for registering for Partner Day 2015. We are looking forward to seeing you in Vienna on October 21st!
Please note that we have updated our Partner Day agenda:
Agenda:
1:30 – 2:00 pm Registration & Welcome Coffee
2:00 – 2:10 pm Welcome Franz Fuchsberger, Co-Founder & CSO
2:10 – 2:50 pm The Future of Testing Franz Fuchsberger, Co-Founder & CSO
2:50 – 3:20 pm Partner Program Update Alan Ota, Strategic Alliances
3:20 – 3:35 pm Tricentis Obstacle Course Michael Niessl, Engineering
3:35 – 4:00 pm Coffee Break
4:00 – 4:45 pm Tosca 9.0 Preview & Demo Gerd Weishaar, VP Product Mgmt Roman Zednik, Director Presales
4:45 – 5:30 pm Product Roadmap 2016 Gerd Weishaar, VP Product Mgmt
5:30 – 5:45 pm Wrap Up & Closing Franz Fuchsberger, Co-Founder & CSO
Location: Novomatic Forum <http://www.novomaticforum.com> Friedrichstraße 7 1010 Wien, Austria
After the Partner Day you will have the opportunity to set up your booth for Accelerate the next day; and we hope you will join us at our Partner and Speaker Dinner, starting at 6:30 PM.
See you soon in Vienna!
Best Regards,
Your Tricentis Events Team
